org.hps.recon.vertexing

Class BilliorTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.vertexing.BilliorTrack

  • public class BilliorTrack
extends Object
    Converts from HelicalTrackFit formalism to formalism in Billior paper See (e.g.) Billior, Qian NIM A311, 1992

    • Field Summary

      Return the error for phi0, azimuthal angle of the momentum at the DCA ref.

      Return the error for slope dz/ds, tan(lambda)
      double getZ0Error()
      Return the error for z0, the z position of the particle at the DCA

      Returns the transpose of the matrix (inexplicably not handled by the matrix package for non-square matrices).

      • chisq

        public double[] chisq()
        Return the helix fit chisqs. chisq[0] is for the circle fit, chisq[1] is for the s-z fit.
        Returns:
        chisq array

      • setnhchisq

        public void setnhchisq(double nhchisq)
        Set the chisq for non-holonomic constraints (e.g., pT > xx).
        Parameters:
        nhchisq - non-holonomic constraint chisq

      • nhchisq

        public double nhchisq()

        Returns:
        non-holenomic constraint chisq

      • chisqtot

        public double chisqtot()
        Return the total chisq: chisq[0] + chisq[1] + nhchisq.
        Returns:
        total chisq

      • ndf

        public int[] ndf()
        Return the degrees of freedom for the fits. ndf[0] is for the circle fit and ndf[1] is for the s-z fit.
        Returns:
        dof array
